templateName.value: Final Notice Program Acceptance Form Deadline

html.value:
Dear {{firstName}} {{lastName}},

Congratulations!

Congratulations on your acceptance into the 2021 LEAD Global Summer Learning Institutes! We look forward to welcoming you into the LEADing for Life community. 

Your Acceptance Form is still OUTSTANDING for {{programName}} and should be completed as soon as possible.

Please complete the Acceptance Form by choosing to ACCEPT or DECLINE. If you intend to accept your appointment, you must also complete the Parent/Scholar Consent form, along with upload of your photo and polo size.

Please make sure a deposit or your balance is paid in full by the applicable payment deadline to avoid enrollment cancellations.

We remain excited about the LEAD {{programName}} and are truly looking forward to welcoming you into the LEAD community!

Best regards,

Sent on behalf of the LEAD Review Team
